description:
When a Humaritt is activated without receiving orders or a master, Najica and Lila are sent to retrieve her before she falls into the hands of a rival organization. But what seemed to be a straightforward capture mission turns complex when they find that this Humaritt is unique...with over three times the strength of normal humans!
How will Najica and Lila stop this renegade Humaritt powerhouse?

titles.title: Die schönen Augen der Bestie sind von Einsamkeit umschattet
Les yeux d`un fauve voilés de solitude
The Beautiful Eye of the Wild Beast Appears with the Shadow of Loneliness
Utsukushiki Yajuu no Hitomi wa Kodoku no Kage to Tomo ni
美しき野獣の瞳は孤独の影と共に
